name: Guerrilla Movement
description: Armed rebels seize control of kingdom territory

failure.msg: Rebels seize territory in your kingdom
manualEffects: Roll 1d3 and mark that many hexes as rebel-controlled (cannot use these hexes until rebellion is resolved)

criticalFailure.msg: Rebels establish a stronghold and raise an army against you
manualEffects: Roll 2d3 and mark that many hexes as rebel-controlled (cannot use these hexes until rebellion is resolved)
Rebels raise an army with level = (your kingdom level - 1). Track this army as an enemy force
